target: Your are going to the imax address at 1118 4th Street, right?
context: <user>  My friend told me to go see this cool movie at imax. Your help setting that up for the 5th would be greatly appreciated. <system>  Sure. What's the name of the movie? <user>  It's called Wild Nights. <system>  And, what city do you want? <user>  Check out an imax in San Rafael, please. <system>  There is an 8: 30 pm showing at the Smith Rafael Film Center. <user>  Okay, and what's the genre of the movie? <system>  The movie is a drama.<user>  Nice one. Now, please order a cab for 1 person to go there. <system>  Do you want a Luxury or Pool or some other type of ride?<user>  The Luxury ride is what I want. <system>
